page.title: 15SCHOOL CONFERENCE -PRIMARY 7
page.content: The{P.7 Conference}is an annual event held at Stirling University. Its aim is to provide children going into{1st {year}at{Stirling High}with the experience of listening and speaking in conference conditions. It is also meant to introduce you to people from different schools in the area who will soon be your friends in High School. Each conference has a different title. In previous years they have been Conservation, Sports Personalities and Human Endeavour. The title this year, 1985, was{Many Peoples -One World. At the conference, after a talk by a person experenced in the subject, everyone divides into groups to talk about the subject in detail. This year some subjects talked about in detail were, clothing, food, personal adornment, dance and drama. A rewarding experience for everyone.
